wikimedia-usermerge-logpagetext: This is a log of user merge actions.
wikimedia-lqt-log-header: This log details actions taken on discussion threads.
wikimedia-lqt-log-action-split: split [[$1]] from under [[$3]], with the new subject "$2"
wikimedia-lqt-log-action-subjectedit: changed the subject of [[$1]] from "$2" to "$3"
wikimedia-lqt-log-action-resort: modified the sort order of [[$1]]. Changed sort key from $2 to $3
wikimedia-lqt-log-action-signatureedit: changed the signature of [[$1]] from "$2" to "$3"
wikimedia-graph-broken-category-desc: The page includes a <graph> tag with invalid usage.
wikimedia-graph-disabled-category-desc: The page includes a <graph> tag, which is temporarily not available ([[phab:T334940|T334940]]).
